distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for perl-Spreadsheet-ParseExcel fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2023-7101: Fixed a command injection issue when parsing an
  untrusted spreadsheet (bsc#1218414).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: Spreadsheet::ParseExcel version 0.65 is a Perl module used for parsing Excel files. Spreadsheet::ParseExcel is vulnerable to an arbitrary code execution (ACE) vulnerability due to passing unvalidated input from a file into a string-type “eval”. Specifically, the issue stems from the evaluation of Number format strings (not to be confused with printf-style format strings) within the Excel parsing logic.
notes.title: CVE description

fixed: SUSE Enterprise Storage 7.1:perl-Spreadsheet-ParseExcel-0.65-150000.3.3.1.noarch
